extensionDescription.message: Plays a sound and shows a notification when a long network request completes on an inactive tab. Customizable threshold and domain filtering.

optionsPageTitle.description: HTML Title for the options page.

optionsTitle.description: Main heading for the options page.

timingHeader.description: Header for the timing settings section.

thresholdLabel.message: Play sound for requests longer than:

domainFilteringHeader.description: Header for the domain filtering section.

monitorAllOption.description: Option text for monitoring all domains.

monitorWhitelistOption.description: Option text for monitoring only whitelisted domains.

monitorBlacklistOption.description: Option text for monitoring all except blacklisted domains.

whitelistLabel.message: Whitelist Domains (one per line or comma-separated):

whitelistInfo.message: If 'Monitor Whitelisted Domains Only' is selected, only requests to these domains (and their subdomains) will be monitored. E.g., example.com will match example.com and api.example.com.

blacklistLabel.message: Blacklist Domains (one per line or comma-separated):

blacklistInfo.message: If 'Monitor All Except Blacklisted Domains' is selected, requests to these domains (and their subdomains) will be ignored. E.g., google-analytics.com

soundSettingsHeader.description: Header for the sound settings section.

customSoundLabel.message: Custom Notification Sound (MP3, OGG, WAV, M4A - max 1MB):
customSoundLabel.description: Label for custom sound file input.

customSoundName.description: Name for a custom uploaded sound.

resetSoundButtonText.description: Text for the reset sound button.

testSoundButtonText.description: Text for the test sound button.

desktopNotificationsHeader.description: Header for the desktop notifications settings section.

enableOsNotificationsLabel.description: Label for the toggle to enable/disable OS desktop notifications.

statusSaved.description: Status message when settings are saved.

statusSoundUploaded.description: Status message when custom sound is uploaded.

statusSoundReset.description: Status message when sound is reset.

statusErrorSaving.description: Status message when error saving settings. Placeholder $1 for error message.

statusInvalidThreshold.message: Error: Please enter a valid number (>= 1) for the threshold.

statusSoundFileErrorTooLarge.message: Error: Sound file is too large (max $maxSize$MB).
statusSoundFileErrorTooLarge.description: Error message for sound file too large. Placeholder $1 for max size.

statusSoundFileErrorInvalidType.message: Error: Invalid sound file type. Please use MP3, OGG, WAV, or M4A.
statusSoundFileErrorInvalidType.description: Error message for invalid sound file type.

statusSoundFileErrorReading.message: Error: Could not read the sound file.
statusSoundFileErrorReading.description: Error message when file reader fails.

notificationMessage.description: Message of the desktop notification. Placeholders: $1 = hostname, $2 = duration.

actionTitle.description: Default title for the browser action button.
